tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I had PCOS and irregular periods for and past 2yrs I don't have a child because of these issues. Then came here and took the medication and now am pregnant. 

Chinthu mam is very friendly in nature and she is an optimistic person who spread positivity to her patients and their families. 

Coming to faculty members Sujatha and nurses named Kavitha, arthi, Ramya, and abhi doing extraordinary work. 

Overall 5 stars

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr.chinthu is very kind, friendly and caring.
Not only has she taken great care of my health, but also she is lovely to speak with at every appointment. Itâ€™s rare to find a doctor that combines such personal touches and care for a patient as a person with outstanding quality of medical care. I highly recommend becoming her patient!
reply_text:
Thank you so much for the amazing feedback!
As a team, all of us are so happy and blessed to take care of you, and to receive your positive vibes.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I'm visiting First time Dr.chinthu and I would like to inform you that the first impressions are the best impression and she proved that. Her way of explaining the issues is extremely clear. Now I need to follow the provided dieting and new to change my lifestyles too. 

Also, I would like to inform that ms. Swetha nurse /receptionist also helps a lot.

Am happy with the first time visiting itself. Thank you, chinthu mam
